title: ORC SMASH!
logline: Chess but pawns are dumb orcs and it's chaos
description:
ORC SMASH! 
 Chess but pawns are dumb orcs and it's chaos 
 ð§ HOW TO PLAY 
 Choose your level  : Desert, Castle or Hell Place Orcs on the left side of the board  (Left Click to Place, Right Click to Delete),  You have 1000 points to hire different types of Orcs.  They have a cost depending on their power. They are all equally stupid and unpredictable, though. Play  START Give orders  with the 4 buttons at the bottom of the screen.  Orders are executed  by all your orcs at once. Chaos  ensue... Have Fun ! 
 ð§ ORCS 
  BOW 
 Attack : Shot  - Shoots arrow in a straight line Special : Volley  - Shoots arrows at 3 random positions 
 HOGRIDER 
 Attack : Knock  - Move forward and knockback enemy  Special : Charge  - Pass through enemies and get back to position 
 LANCE Attack : Thrust  - Attacks a random forward diagonal Special : Impale  - Attacks 2 tiles in front of him  
 SHAMAN 
 Attack :  Fireball  - Attack a random enemy  Special : Spirit Walk  - Teleports at a random and attacks all around him 
 SWORD Attack : Swing -  Strong forward attack  Special : Cleave  - Attack the 3 adjacent tiles in from of him 
 ð§ ASSETS 
 Homemade : - "Orc Chaos" Soundtrack (it's  orc hestral music, got it?) - Orcs sprites (fighters, orc king, spectators), Demons sprites (cool satan, spectators), Throne, Torch, Banner, Snake, Interface Panels and Buttons - Interface Sound Effects - Castle, Desert and Hell Arenas (but made using borrowed tilesets) Borrowed : -  Cave Tileset -  Desert Tileset -  Castle Tileset -  Orc Speech SFX -  Bow and Arrow SFX -  Spellcast SFX -  Swoosh SFX -  Sword Swipe SFX -  Brick Background -  Murphy's Folly Font 
 ð§ CREDITS 
 EvilBunnyMan  - Art & Game Design Seveen  - Code & Game Design Made for the  Odin 7 Day Jam

title: Hover Racing
logline: Embark on a a colorful race !
description:
Hover Racing  is a high-speed, gravity-defying racing game set on a dazzling rainbow road stretching through the vastness of space. Compete against rivals as you shift gravity at will, racing along the top, sides, and even underneath the track to find the fastest path. Dodge cosmic hazards, destroy asteroids to collect boost energy, and pull off insane aerial maneuvers to leave your opponents in the dust. With stunning neon visuals, dynamic physics, and adrenaline-pumping speed,  Hover Racing  delivers a heart-pounding space-racing experience like no other! 
 
 Keyboard 
 Input Action Z Forward S Backward QD Turn Shift Boost Left Click Shoot Mouse Movement Crosshair E / Esc Pause 
 
 Gamepad 
 Input
 Action
 RT Forward
 Gamepad Face Left Button Backward
 Right Joystick Turn
 Gamepad Face Bottom Button Boost
 LB Shoot
 Left Joystick
 Crosshair
 Gamepad Right Special
 Pause

title: Brummagem, Instruments and Curiosities I
logline: Six new exotica for Vaults of Vaarn
description:
BRUMMAGEM, INSTRUMENTS, AND CURIOSITIES I  contains six new exotica for Vaults of Vaarn â Compendium of Universal Knowledge, Crystallized Dreams, Farvoyer, Horn of Pretite Locquacity, and the Temporal Monitor.  
 Thee exoticat are converted, or rather transposed from the Dungeon  Crawl Classics Dying Earth Box Set, based on the Dying Earth Series by  Jack Vance. 
  
 This set is part of my project to transpose content, especially  monsters and treasures / exotica from the DCC Dying Earth into Vaults of  Vaarn.
  
 Cover illustration  by TyloPilo .
 
 If you are interested in collaborating on illustrations layout or elsewhere, feel free to contact me.

title: Tree Simulator 2.0 - Demo
description:
Have you always wanted to be a tree? According to studies, one in three people would like to have been a tree at least once in their lives. From birth, people long for freedom and wealth, but before you can put down roots you need a stable foundation of tree bark. 
 In this simulator you will experience what it is like to be a tree. You decide whether you graduate from the tree nursery and become an adult tree house or whether you prefer to do somersaults and end up as paper instead.

title: X17: The Silent Ward
logline: Chilling point-and-click horror. Explore a facility, solve puzzles in a 15-min prototype. Work in progress.
description:
X17: The Silent Ward   X17: The Silent Ward" is a short, puzzle-driven point-and-click adventure game, entirely created by a single developer using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
  
 Be warned: this game isnât easy and wonât hold your hand â it requires keen observation and some thinking to progress. To use items, right-click on them in your inventory and choose "use" or "combine". 
 
 Step into the role of a soul trapped in an abandoned hospital, from which you must escape by combining items and exploring interactive locations. Face unsettling puzzles, chilling effects, and a haunting atmosphere steeped in mystery. Do you dare to uncover the secrets of the X-17 experiment?
 This 15-30 minute prototype is dark, immersive, and built from scratch.
  
 It took me a month of intense work to create, and shaping it â from the code to its eerie atmosphere â brought me immense satisfaction. This is my first project of this kind.
  
 Iâd be grateful for your feedback! 
 
 PL:

title: Whiteout
logline: Scale the mountain, don't fall.
description: Climb "one hit point" and hit the button to reset the radio tower and establish contact with the outside world.  Don't fall. You'll die.  All assets created by LDMONTY007 unless otherwise noted. VCR Font used:  https://www.dafont.com/vcr-osd-mono.font

title: Backrooms Escape Room VR
logline: A short and simple escape room made in Unity
description:
This game is a simple escape room with a backrooms theme. It contains a few puzzles and a short playtime of around 15 minutes.  
 All assets used can be seen below: 
 Sliding puzzle reference script Backrooms asset pack Sound effects (key, padlock, sliding puzzle, etc) Skybox AllSky Wood doors pack Taiko drum 
 Developed by: 
 Julia Karine Gustavo Pacheco
